document_data.caption: The Guard Barracks (labeled 7) on a ''circa'' [[1357 DR]] map of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.name: Guard Barracks
document_data.mainbody: These '''Guard Barracks''' housed the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the city's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]].
document_data.Location: These barracks were located at the intersection of the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High road]] and [[Trollkill Street]].<ref>
document_data.Structure: This building stood three-stories tall. Like all barracks of the City Watch, it was built to be fireproof.
